Articles.Content:
RasTech Javelin.

Based on the Gloster Javelin of the 1950's; one of my favourite aircraft. [http://kerbalx.com/erasmusguy/RasTech-Javelin](http://kerbalx.com/erasmusguy/RasTech-Javelin)

![o9sd7U8.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/o9sd7U8.png?1)

![Eqs4hOb.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/Eqs4hOb.png?1)

<iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>
very nice design, love the javelin. All these british jets make me feel warm inside ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Simple but actually beautiful! A combination a lot of designers fail at.

Very elegant design there man. Kudos!

 I am not a fan of the new cockpit though. It looks so cheap.. Why cant someone make a transparent cockpit?

Anywhoo, nice design!

Nice plane! 

and ...

Yes! Transparent cockpits we want!

> 
> very nice design, love the javelin. All these british jets make me feel warm inside ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I'll have to make a few more for you bud ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Very elegant design there man. Kudos!
>  I am not a fan of the new cockpit though. It looks so cheap.. Why cant someone make a transparent cockpit?
> 
> Anywhoo, nice design!

Thank you! I have to agree with you guys on the cockpit though
